rsbNotes.title: Pr 27:7
rsbNotes.text: 27:7 See 25:16, 17, 27 and notes. The meaning of the proverb is not limited to food, but applies to anything for which we have an appetite.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 27:8
rsbNotes.text: 27:8 Rootlessness hurts both the wanderer and those with whom he should be relating. Human beings need personal relationships.
